fcb_fab_flexible_title: Rigid-Flex PCB - A Perfect Modern Connection Solution for Circuits
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_zero: PCBONLINE is good at rigid-flex PCBs, a type of the most advanced boards. The rigid-flex PCB is a type of circuit board that combines the features of the rigid board and the flex board - it can be twisted, folded or rolled into the required shape at some points, and can maintain hard and stable at some points.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_one: Designed in 3D space, the rigid-flex PCB eliminates the solder joints and cables, which makes multiple material and design layouts possible.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_two: Given that rigid-flex PCBs have greater spatial efficiency, they benefit all electrical applications and are widely used in the electronic products.
fcb_fab_flexible_advantages_bottom_word_: • Reduce the space, weight, and logistic cost;
• Apt for both the static and the dynamic application;
• There is an increase in the circuit density;
• Excellent in preserving signal along with its speed power and clarity.

fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_two: • We have our own rigid-flex facility and in-house R&D team to produce and assemble rigid-flex circuit boards.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_three: • Strict quality control is mandated through all testing and production phases. All rigid-flex PCBs/PCBA are compliant with the ISO, RoHS, and IPC standards.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_four: • We can produce custom rigid-flex PCBs at any volume as per you required, for mass production, small-batch prototypes, commercial purpose, and hobby-level services, etc.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_five: • Our professional team can provide advice for free if there's any problem in your layout.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_six: • We can provide one-stop service including rigid-flex PCB layout, electronic components, PCB manufacturing & assembly, and your final product assembly.

fcb_fab_flexible_related_title: Other Users Are Also Getting a Quote to Related Products
fcb_fab_flexible_related_rigid_word: These PCBs integrate flexible PCBs and rigid PCBs. Because connectors are not required for connection between layers, they are ideal for digital devices that are vulnerable to noise effect.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_tick_word: HF PCB is used to transmit high frequency signals. It prevents the signal loss and transmission delay, which makes it essential for the communication industry.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_multilayer_word: Thick-copper PCB transmits great electric current and maintains the temperature of the whole system. With it, engineers can work with the extreme thermal resistance.
